parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.48

</value></part><part><name>gr1 </name>=<value> Multiplayer

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns name of the hosting server in MP, "" in SP.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[serverName]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[String]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[hint]] [[format]] ["Welcome to the %1 server!", [[serverName]]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[worldName]], [[briefingName]], [[missionName]], [[worldSize]]
</value></part></template>
